name: microfrontend-demo
description: Microfrontend architecture demo using webpack module federation

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:host" "npm run start:world" "npm run start:solar" "npm run start:universe"
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/host && npm install && cd ../world && npm install && cd ../solar-system && npm install && cd ../universe && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:world && npm run build:solar && npm run build:universe && npm run build:host
